cure_light_wounds.name: Cure Light Wounds
cure_light_wounds.description: Channels divine energy to heal minor wounds
cure_light_wounds.special: Can target self if no target specified

cure_serious_wounds.name: Cure Serious Wounds
cure_serious_wounds.description: Channels powerful divine energy to heal moderate wounds
cure_serious_wounds.special: Can target self if no target specified

heal.name: Heal
heal.description: Channels overwhelming divine power to completely heal all wounds
heal.special: Restores target to maximum hit points

bless.name: Bless
bless.description: Calls upon divine favor to enhance combat abilities

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.description: Surrounds the target with divine protection that deters attacks
sanctuary.special: Attackers must make Will save to target protected creature

turn_undead.name: Turn Undead
turn_undead.description: Channels divine power to repel or destroy undead creatures
turn_undead.special: Affects only undead creatures, may cause them to flee or be destroyed

spiritual_hammer.name: Spiritual Hammer
spiritual_hammer.description: Creates a spectral hammer that strikes enemies with divine force
